languages.text: "Жизнь мон-кай быстротечна. Вы спешите прожить ее во имя избранной цели, но мысли о временности и утрате пугают вас, и потому вы гоните их прочь, топите в каждодневной суете. Но крепость души прорастает именно из тех моментов, которые приходят в нашу жизнь и вскоре из нее исчезают. Как миг цветения или час увядания, что прекрасны своей кратковременностью. Как воспоминания о тех, кто более не идет с нами одним путем".

"Mon-keigh lives pass so swiftly. You rush through them for the sake of a chosen goal, but thoughts of transience and loss frighten you, and so you drive such thoughts away and drown yourselves in the daily tumult. But it is from fleeting moments, which enter our lives and quickly vanish from them, that the soul's fortress grows. A moment's blooming, an hour's wilting — the splendour of each lies in its ephemerality. So too the memories of those who have left our side and no longer walk the path with us."
languages.original_text: "Жизнь мон-кай быстротечна. Вы спешите прожить ее во имя избранной цели, но мысли о временности и утрате пугают вас, и потому вы гоните их прочь, топите в каждодневной суете. languages.text: «La vida de los mon-keigh transcurre en un suspiro. Pasáis por ella a toda prisa con tal de alcanzar la meta que os habéis propuesto, pero os aterra pensar en la transitoriedad y la pérdida; por eso desecháis tales pensamientos y os ahogáis en el tumulto de lo cotidiano. Pero son esos momentos fugaces, los que entran en nuestras vidas y se desvanecen rápidamente, los que fortalecen el alma. Florecer un instante, marchitarse al siguiente... El esplendor de cada cosa yace en su naturaleza efímera. Lo mismo sucede con los recuerdos de quienes nos dejan y ya no recorren la senda con nosotros».
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh lives pass so swiftly. You rush through them for the sake of a chosen goal, but thoughts of transience and loss frighten you, and so you drive such thoughts away and drown yourselves in the daily tumult. But it is from fleeting moments, which enter our lives and quickly vanish from them, that the soul's fortress grows. El esplendor de cada cosa yace en su naturaleza efímera. Lo mismo sucede con los recuerdos de quienes nos dejan y ya no recorren la senda con nosotros».

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイの命は実に短い。あなたたちは選んだ目的のために生き急ぐあまり、儚さや喪失を考えると怖くなり、そのような考えを遠ざけ、日々の喧騒に溺れてしまう。しかし、私たちの人生に入ってきてはすぐに消えてしまう束の間の瞬間からこそ、魂の砦は成長するものだ。一瞬で咲き誇り、長い時間をかけて枯れていく。それぞれの素晴らしさは、その儚さにある。私たちから去り、もはや私たちとともに道を歩むことのない人々の思い出もまた然りだ」
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh lives pass so swiftly. You rush through them for the sake of a chosen goal, but thoughts of transience and loss frighten you, and so you drive such thoughts away and drown yourselves in the daily tumult. But it is from fleeting moments, which enter our lives and quickly vanish from them, that the soul's fortress grows. A moment's blooming, an hour's wilting — the splendour of each lies in its ephemerality. So too the memories of those who have left our side and no longer walk the path with us."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイの命は実に短い。あなたたちは選んだ目的のために生き急ぐあまり、儚さや喪失を考えると怖くなり、そのような考えを遠ざけ、日々の喧騒に溺れてしまう。しかし、私たちの人生に入ってきてはすぐに消えてしまう束の間の瞬間からこそ、魂の砦は成長するものだ。一瞬で咲き誇り、長い時間をかけて枯れていく。それぞれの素晴らしさは、その儚さにある。私たちから去り、もはや私たちとともに道を歩むことのない人々の思い出もまた然りだ」

languages.text: “猴子的生命转瞬即逝。你们为了自己择定的某个目标匆匆度过一生，却仍然无法摆脱人生苦短与患得患失的恐惧。为了驱赶这些念头，你们将自己淹没在日常的喧嚣之中。然而，正是凭借生命中这些来去匆匆的短暂时刻，我们才得以筑起灵魂的坚堡。好花不常开，好景不常在——美的壮丽，只在于它的短暂。那些曾经与我们结伴而行，却最终分道扬镳的人，他们所留下的回忆也是如此。”
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh lives pass so swiftly. You rush through them for the sake of a chosen goal, but thoughts of transience and loss frighten you, and so you drive such thoughts away and drown yourselves in the daily tumult. But it is from fleeting moments, which enter our lives and quickly vanish from them, that the soul's fortress grows. A moment's blooming, an hour's wilting — the splendour of each lies in its ephemerality. So too the memories of those who have left our side and no longer walk the path with us."

traits.locale_text: “猴子的生命转瞬即逝。你们为了自己择定的某个目标匆匆度过一生，却仍然无法摆脱人生苦短与患得患失的恐惧。为了驱赶这些念头，你们将自己淹没在日常的喧嚣之中。然而，正是凭借生命中这些来去匆匆的短暂时刻，我们才得以筑起灵魂的坚堡。好花不常开，好景不常在——美的壮丽，只在于它的短暂。那些曾经与我们结伴而行，却最终分道扬镳的人，他们所留下的回忆也是如此。”

languages.text: « Les vies des mon-keigh sont si brèves. Vous les traversez en toute hâte pour atteindre un but donné, mais les notions d'impermanence et de perte vous effraient, au point que vous écartez de telles pensées et vous noyez dans le tumulte du quotidien. Cependant, la forteresse de l'âme se renforce lors de moments fugaces qui entrent dans nos vies et en disparaissent tout aussi vite. L'épanouissement d'un instant et le flétrissement d'une heure tirent leur splendeur de leur caractère éphémère. Il en va de même pour les souvenirs de ceux qui ne sont plus à nos côtés. »
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh lives pass so swiftly. You rush through them for the sake of a chosen goal, but thoughts of transience and loss frighten you, and so you drive such thoughts away and drown yourselves in the daily tumult. But it is from fleeting moments, which enter our lives and quickly vanish from them, that the soul's fortress grows. A moment's blooming, an hour's wilting — the splendour of each lies in its ephemerality. So too the memories of those who have left our side and no longer walk the path with us."

traits.locale_text: « Les vies des mon-keigh sont si brèves. Vous les traversez en toute hâte pour atteindre un but donné, mais les notions d'impermanence et de perte vous effraient, au point que vous écartez de telles pensées et vous noyez dans le tumulte du quotidien. Cependant, la forteresse de l'âme se renforce lors de moments fugaces qui entrent dans nos vies et en disparaissent tout aussi vite. L'épanouissement d'un instant et le flétrissement d'une heure tirent leur splendeur de leur caractère éphémère. Il en va de même pour les souvenirs de ceux qui ne sont plus à nos côtés. »

languages.text: "Die Leben der Chem-Pan-Sey verstreichen so schnell. Ihr hetzt durch Euer Leben, einem auserwählten Ziel hinterher, doch jeder Gedanke an Vergänglichkeit und Verlust ängstigt Euch. Ihr vertreibt solche Gedanken und ertränkt Euch im täglichen Tumult. Dabei wächst die Festung der Seele gerade an flüchtigen Augenblicken, die in unser Leben treten und schnell wieder daraus verschwinden. Das Erblühen eines Augenblicks, das Verwelken einer Stunde — der Glanz beider liegt in ihrer Kurzlebigkeit. Das gilt auch für die Erinnerung an jene, die unsere Seite verlassen haben und nicht länger unseren Pfad mit uns beschreiten."
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh lives pass so swiftly. languages.text: "Mon-keigh hayatı çok hızlı geçiyor. Bir amaç belirleyip onun peşinde koşturuyorsunuz ama fanilik ve kayıplar üzerine düşünmek sizi korkutuyor. O yüzden bu düşünceleri beyninizden kovup kendinizi günlük hayatın hengâmesine veriyorsunuz. Fakat ruhun kalesi, hayatlarımıza girip hızla kaybolan geçici anlarda yükseliyor. Bir an yeşerip bir saat solmak... Her birinin ihtişamı, geçiciliğinde yatıyor. Tıpkı yanımızdan ayrılmış ve artık aynı yolda bizimle yürümeyenlerin hatıraları gibi."
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh lives pass so swiftly.
